devTool.description: Single API for creating embedded wallets, smart signers, and automating onchain actions
React hooks library streamlining wallet connections and contract interactions
Customizable React components for wallet connections
OAuth social logins with non-custodial key management for Web3 applications.
Wallet infrastructure using account abstraction and batched transactions
Development platform offering debugging, monitoring, and simulation services
SDK for building, launching, and managing Web3 applications with minimal configuration
